name: Saikyou Ginsei Chess
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Enjoy playing chess, the representative game of Europe in "Saikyo Ginsei Chess". Even beginners can feel at ease as the pieces' area of movement are shown while fast learners can fully display their ability. This is a game for all chess lovers.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
